name: Jump! (Suus)
description:
What is it?

This game is the first out of 10 in the "One Game A Week" Project. The theme for the first week is: jump. So we made a little game where you can..... exactly: jump!

Is it good?

Overall this little game isn't too great, but for myself I am very happy with it. I learned a lot! I have never made a platformer before. This was interesting. Also to work with other scripts (provided by Unity) and my own or mixing these. It is all at a very beginner level, but it sure felt great making this. Working with my own assets and assets from the Unity store (which should be clearly visible :') ) was a new and cool experience. Putting my own audio in. All in all I felt a lot of joy making this. The game itself is barely a game: in case you are interested in downloading it. Do as you like. Check it out maybe!

See you next week.

Who am I?

I am a Game Design student enrolled at the University of Europe in Berlin. Currently I am in my third semester and part of the One Game A Week project. My personal focus is to improve my technical skill and confidence and to learn as much as I can either about: Unity, Photoshop, C# scripting, Design, Game Dev Fundamentals, Game Design Fundamentals and Game Art Fundamentals.

For more information go to: http://gamedesign.ue-germany.de/
